 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָתוֺן‎</span> **noun feminine**<sup>[[Gen.45.23|Gen 45:23]]</sup> ==she-ass== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אַתָּנָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***atânu***</u></abbr>) — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָתוֺן‎</span> [[Num.22.23|Num 22:23]] + 10 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲתֹנְךָ‎</span> [[Num.22.30|Num 22:30]]; [[Num.22.32|Num 22:32]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲתֹנוֺ‎</span> [[Gen.49.11|Gen 49:11]] + 2 t.; plural absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲתֹנֹת‎</span> [[Gen.12.16|Gen 12:16]] + 2 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲתֹנוֺת‎</span> [[Judg.5.10|Judg 5:10]] + 12 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲתוֺנוֺת‎</span> [[Job.1.3|Job 1:3]]; [[Job.42.12|Job 42:12]] — she-ass, as dam [[Gen.49.11|Gen 49:11]]; [[Zech.9.9|Zech 9:9]] as property (constituting wealth) [[Gen.12.16|Gen 12:16]]; [[Gen.32.16|Gen 32:16]]; [[Job.1.3|Job 1:3]]; [[Job.1.14|Job 1:14]]; [[Job.42.12|Job 42:12]] compare [[1Chr.27.30|1Chr 27:30]] so of the asses of Kish 8 t. [[1Sam.9.3|1Sam 9:3]] (twice in verse); [[1Sam.9.5|1Sam 9:5]]; [[1Sam.9.20|1Sam 9:20]]; [[1Sam.10.2|1Sam 10:2]] (twice in verse); [[1Sam.10.14|1Sam 10:14]]; [[1Sam.10.16|1Sam 10:16]] as beasts of burden [[Gen.45.23|Gen 45:23]] for riding [[Judg.5.10|Judg 5:10]]; [[Num.22.21|Num 22:21]]; [[Num.22.22|Num 22:22]]; [[2Kgs.4.22|2Kgs 4:22]]; [[2Kgs.4.24|2Kgs 4:24]] of Balaam's ass 14 t. [[Num.22.21|Num 22:21]]; [[Num.22.22|Num 22:22]]; [[Num.22.23|Num 22:23]] (3 t. in verse); [[Num.22.25|Num 22:25]]; [[Num.22.27|Num 22:27]] (twice in verse); [[Num.22.28|Num 22:28]]; [[Num.22.29|Num 22:29]]; [[Num.22.30|Num 22:30]] (twice in verse); [[Num.22.32|Num 22:32]]; [[Num.22.33|Num 22:33]]. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַתֵּן‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַתֵּנָה‎</span> see below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אנת‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתְנָה‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תנה‎</span>.
